name: The Super Sandwich
author: Olivia S
summary: The sandwich that meets all of your tasty needs.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen bite-size potato nuggets (such as Tater Tots®), or as needed
2 slices deli ham, or more to taste
2 slices deli turkey, or more to taste
10  potato chips (such as Lay's®), or more to taste
1 slice Swiss cheese, or more to taste
directions: Preheat a waffle iron according to manufacturer's instructions
Place about 1/2 of the potato nuggets on the preheated waffle iron, close the waffle iron, and cook until nuggets are golden brown and pressed to resemble a slice of bread, 3 to 5 minutes
Place 1 slice of potato nugget "bread" on a plate; top with ham and turkey
Set tomato atop sliced meats and top tomato with potato chips
Place bacon over chips, Swiss cheese over bacon, and pickles over cheese
Top with remaining slice of potato nugget "bread"
